verbose_text: To test the hypothesis that signaling induced downstream of Tir clustering by its ligand intimin was required for inflammasome activation, we infected macrophages with EPEC expressing Tir Y474A / Y454A (Tir AA, which neither undergoes phosphorylation nor activates N-WASP) or the Deltaeae mutant (which cannot activate Tir as it lacks intimin) (schematic in XREF_FIG A and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A).
